revised_title: Elastic Stability of Slightly Bent Rectangular Plates Under Uniform Shear
tldr: This article investigates the elastic stability of a long, slightly bent rectangular plate under uniform shear. The authors develop a method to determine the stability of the plate by considering the equilibrium stresses and displacements caused by applying a uniform shearing force to the two straight edges. They use shell equations and Fourier series to analyze the problem and provide a solution that satisfies the boundary conditions.
